Articles.Content: As the title says, is there anyway to roll back to 1.12 untill some mods get updated so i dont lose hours and hours of gameplay from my save?

I cant help you as such, just give some advice for the future: maybe you should start to play the game off a different folder than the one steam puts it into. This way you can keep all the previous versions you want, just get the new version out of the steam folder whenever there's an update. Just a thought. Steam lets you copy the game to any directory you want.
What version does 'previous stable release' in Steam give you?
